about_the_game:
The Magic Forest is in danger. In the midst of an ancient conflict, brothers Azulin and Gordi, along with an inexperienced group of recruits, embark on a mission to save their home from the unicorns. ‘Unicorn Wars’ is a hand-crafted platform and exploration game, with characters and environments based on the acclaimed film “Unicorn Wars”.

Pass your training at the camp, traverse the depths of the forest and discover the secrets of the temple as you face the terrible unicorns that plague the world. In ‘Unicorn Wars’ you can take on the role of Azulin to explore unique landscapes, solve puzzles, discover secret areas and confront the loathsome unicorns.

  • Create your own bear: Use the character creator to edit and customise your own protagonist.

  • Challenge Mode: Feel the challenge and earn incredible rewards in timed levels that will test the skills of even the most experienced players.

  • Play Cards: Create, mix and match your cards in a unique game mode that further expands the ‘Unicorn Wars’ universe.

  • Unique enemies and bosses: Fight your way through enemies both new and inspired by the movie, and challenge the final bosses of each level, each with unique and challenging mechanics.

Death to the unicorn!
